thread.title: Hotel Napoleon is the perfect place to stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Hotel Napoleon is the perfect place to stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Napoleon Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nan B
title: Hotel Napoleon is the perfect place to stay in Paris
text: A charming hotel in a fantastic location, steps away from the Arc de Triumph and a block from the Champs Elysse. The staff is friendly and helpful and the breakfast is wonderful! The rooms are comfortable and have all the amenities. We couldn't have asked for a better hotel for our Paris visit and will definitely stay there again if we return to Paris. Thanks to the entire staff for making our visit perfect!
